title: [BUG] no text in alpha client login screen

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body: seems to happen if i rapidly quit and reopen my client or after the client crashes

replies.body: Same problem here. Have no idea how to fix it. Restart client wont work. This happens everytime. Ps: no texture in the friend list and general options as well.
Have you fixed it? i tried to reinstall client, still the same
Happened a couple times for me as well. A quick restart of the client fixed it.
Seems to be a bug with one of the tools that we are using, we are investigating. Thanks for testing the alpha!
Do you have any useful suggestions now? It really bothers me a lot.
I had this happen as well although I didn't screenshot it. Only happened once for me though.
